```{r}

unnorm_lik_fun = function(theta) {theta^y * (1 - theta)^(n-y)}

n = 10
y = rbinom(1,n,0.6)
curve(unnorm_lik_fun,from = 0,to = 1, main=paste("n = ",n,";  y = ",y))

```

```{r}
n = 100
y = rbinom(1,n,0.6)
curve(unnorm_lik_fun,from = 0,to = 1, main=paste("n = ",n,";  y = ",y))
```
